sections.title: Introduction
sections.content: Lout is a lightware document formatting system invented by Jeffrey H. Kingston. It reads a high-level description of a document similar in style to LaTeX and produces a PostScript.

sections.title: Installation
sections.content:
Install the lout package.

In order to enable cyrillic printout, fonts need to be installed separately (e.g lout-dejavu-gitAUR).
